title: Kona Grill offers private event hosting services
statement: Kona Grill provides private event hosting for various occasions including corporate lunches, pharma dinners, family gatherings, receptions, birthdays, anniversaries, and baby showers.

citations.quote: Whether it is a corporate lunch outing, pharma dinner, family gathering, reception, birthday, anniversary, or baby shower â€“ Kona Grill is your ONE & ONLY destination for your next event!
